languages.text: {n}Сенешаль Абеляр Версериан растерял часть своего прежнего лоска: на его лбу выступил пот, а рукав кителя разорван и пропитан кровью. Тем не менее, старый офицер, пускай и запыхавшийся, твердо стоит на ногах и взирает на вас требовательным, хотя и несколько удивленным, взглядом.{/n} "Госпо{mf|дин|жа} {name}! Что... что вы делаете в Камере {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патента{/g}? Как вы..." {n}Он оглядывается, осматривая место побоища. Его лоб собирается в мелкую складку, а рука ложится на оружие.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Трон{/g} меня храни, что здесь творится?!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Сенешаль Абеляр Версериан растерял часть своего прежнего лоска: на его лбу выступил пот, а рукав кителя разорван и пропитан кровью. Тем не менее, старый офицер, пускай и запыхавшийся, твердо стоит на ногах и взирает на вас требовательным, пускай и несколько удивленным, взглядом.{/n} "Госпо{mf|дин|жа} {name}! Что... что вы делаете в Камере {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патента{/g}? Как вы..." {n}Он оглядывается, осматривая место побоища. Его лоб собирается в мелкую складку, а рука ложится на оружие.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Трон{/g} меня храни, что здесь творится?!"

languages.text: {n}Seneschal Abelard Werserian has lost some of his former polish: his forehead is sweating, and one of the sleeves of his coat is torn and soaked through with blood. Nonetheless, despite his heavy breathing, he stands firm and his gaze is demanding, albeit somewhat surprised.{/n} "{mf|Master|Mistress} {name}! What... Whatever are you doing in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Chamber? How did you..." {n}He surveys the carnage around him. His brow furrows, and he places a hand on his weapon.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} preserve me, what is the meaning of this?"
languages.original_text: {n}Сенешаль Абеляр Версериан растерял часть своего прежнего лоска: на его лбу выступил пот, а рукав кителя разорван и пропитан кровью. Тем не менее, старый офицер, пускай и запыхавшийся, твердо стоит на ногах и взирает на вас требовательным, хотя и несколько удивленным, взглядом.{/n} "Госпо{mf|дин|жа} {name}! traits.locale_text: {n}Seneschal Abelard Werserian has lost some of his former primness: his forehead is sweating, and one of the sleeves of his coat is torn and soaked in blood. Nonetheless, despite his heavy breathing, he stands firm and his gaze is demanding, albeit somewhat surprised.{/n} "{mf|Master|Mistress} {name}! What... Whatever are you doing in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Chamber? How did you..." {n}He surveys the carnage around him. His brow furrows, and he places a hand on his weapon.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} preserve me, what is the meaning of this?"

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德·韦尔森总领看起来不像之前那样优雅。他的额头出了汗，外套的一个袖子也被撕开，上面浸透了鲜血。尽管他看起来有些狼狈，呼吸也很粗重，但他的站姿依然稳健，目光也依然很严厉。不过，他看起来有些惊讶。{/n}“{name}大人！这是怎么回事……您……您在{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}授状{/g}大厅里做什么？您是怎么……”{n}他打量着周围的惨状，将一只手搭在了武器上。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}在上啊，这到底是怎么回事？”
languages.original_text: {n}Seneschal Abelard Werserian has lost some of his former polish: his forehead is sweating, and one of the sleeves of his coat is torn and soaked through with blood. Nonetheless, despite his heavy breathing, he stands firm and his gaze is demanding, albeit somewhat surprised.{/n} "{mf|Master|Mistress} {name}! What... Whatever are you doing in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Chamber? How did you..." {n}He surveys the carnage around him. His brow furrows, and he places a hand on his weapon.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} preserve me, what is the meaning of this?"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德·韦尔森总领看起来不像之前那样优雅。他的额头出了汗，外套的一个袖子也被撕开，上面浸透了鲜血。尽管他看起来有些狼狈，呼吸也很粗重，但他的站姿依然稳健，目光也依然很严厉。不过，他看起来有些惊讶。{/n}“{name}大人！这是怎么回事……您……您在{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}许可证{/g}大厅里做什么？您是怎么……”{n}他打量着周围的惨状，将一只手搭在了武器上。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}在上啊，这到底是怎么回事？”

languages.text: {n}El Senescal Abelard Werserian ha perdido parte de su previa pulcritud: su frente está cubierta de sudor y una de las mangas de su abrigo está rasgada y empapada de sangre. Aun así, a pesar de su respiración pesada, se mantiene firme y su mirada es desafiante, aunque también algo sorprendida.{/n} «¡Maestr{mf|o|a} {name}! ¿Qué...? ¿Qué está haciendo en la sala de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g}? ¿Cómo ha...?». {n}Examina la matanza que le rodea. Abelard frunce el ceño y lleva la mano a su arma.{/n} «Que el {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono{/g} me guarde, ¿qué significa esto?».
languages.original_text: {n}Seneschal Abelard Werserian has lost some of his former polish: his forehead is sweating, and one of the sleeves of his coat is torn and soaked through with blood. Nonetheless, despite his heavy breathing, he stands firm and his gaze is demanding, albeit somewhat surprised.{/n} "{mf|Master|Mistress} {name}! What... Whatever are you doing in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Chamber? How did you..." {n}He surveys the carnage around him. His brow furrows, and he places a hand on his weapon.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} preserve me, what is the meaning of this?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El Senescal Abelard Werserian ha perdido parte de su previa pulcritud: su frente está cubierta de sudor y una de las mangas de su abrigo está rasgada y empapada de sangre. Aun así, a pesar de su respiración pesada, se mantiene firme y su mirada es desafiante, aunque también algo sorprendida.{/n} «¡Maestr{mf|o|a} {name}! ¿Qué...? ¿Qué está haciendo en la sala de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g}? ¿Cómo ha...?». {n}Examina la matanza que le rodea. Abelard frunce el ceño y lleva la mano a su arma.{/n} «Que el {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono{/g} me guarde, ¿qué significa esto?».

languages.text: {n}家令長アベラルド・ウェルザリアンは、以前の輝きを失った。額に汗が浮かび、外套の片方の袖はほつれ、血に濡れている。それでも、重い息遣いにもかかわらず、彼はしっかりと立ち、その目は驚いたようでありながらも、何かを強く要求している。{/n}「{name}様！な…何を{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}部屋でしていらっしゃるのですか？どうやって…」{n}彼は周囲の惨状を見渡し、眉間にしわを寄せ、武器に手を置いた。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}王座{/g}よ、これは一体どういうことなのです？」
languages.original_text: {n}Seneschal Abelard Werserian has lost some of his former polish: his forehead is sweating, and one of the sleeves of his coat is torn and soaked through with blood. Nonetheless, despite his heavy breathing, he stands firm and his gaze is demanding, albeit somewhat surprised.{/n} "{mf|Master|Mistress} {name}! What... Whatever are you doing in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Chamber? How did you..." {n}He surveys the carnage around him. His brow furrows, and he places a hand on his weapon.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} preserve me, what is the meaning of this?"

traits.locale_text: {n}家令長アベラルド・ウェルザリアンは、以前の輝きを失った。額に汗が浮かび、外套の片方の袖はほつれ、血に濡れている。にもかかわらず、息絶え絶えながらも悠然と経ち、その目は驚いたようでありながらも、何かを強く要求している。{/n}「{mf|ご主人様|ご主人様}{name}！な…何を{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}部屋でしていらっしゃるのですか？どうやって…」{n}彼は周囲の惨殺を調査する。彼は眉間にしわを寄せ、武器に手を置いた。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}玉座{/g}よ、ありがとう。これにはどんな意味があるんだ？」

{n}家令長アベラルド・ウェルザリアンは、以前の輝きを失った。額に汗が浮かび、外套の片方の袖はほつれ、血に濡れている。それでも、重い息遣いにもかかわらず、彼はしっかりと立ち、その目は驚いたようでありながらも、何かを強く要求している。{/n}「{name}様！な…何を{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}部屋でしていらっしゃるのですか？どうやって…」{n}彼は周囲の惨状を見渡し、眉間にしわを寄せ、武器に手を置いた。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}王座{/g}よ、これは一体どういうことなのです？」

languages.text: {n}Le sénéchal Abélard Werserian a quelque peu perdu de sa superbe : son front est perlé de sueur, tandis que l'une de ses manches est déchirée et trempée de sang. Mais malgré sa respiration lourde, il se tient droit et son regard est inquisiteur, bien que légèrement surpris.{/n} « {mf|Maître|Maîtresse} {name} ! Mais... que faites-vous dans la salle de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} ? Comment avez-vous... » {n}Il observe le carnage autour de lui et fronce les sourcils en posant une main sur son arme.{/n} « Par le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône{/g}, que se passe-t-il ici ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Seneschal Abelard Werserian has lost some of his former polish: his forehead is sweating, and one of the sleeves of his coat is torn and soaked through with blood. Nonetheless, despite his heavy breathing, he stands firm and his gaze is demanding, albeit somewhat surprised.{/n} "{mf|Master|Mistress} {name}! What... Whatever are you doing in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Chamber? How did you..." {n}He surveys the carnage around him. His brow furrows, and he places a hand on his weapon.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} preserve me, what is the meaning of this?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sénéchal Abélard Werserian a quelque peu perdu de sa superbe : son front est perlé de sueur, tandis que l'une de ses manches est déchirée et trempée de sang. Mais malgré sa respiration lourde, il se tient droit et son regard est inquisiteur, bien que légèrement surpris.{/n} « {mf|Maître|Maîtresse} {name} ! Mais... que faites-vous dans la salle de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} ? Comment avez-vous... » {n}Il observe le carnage autour de lui et fronce les sourcils en posant une main sur son arme.{/n} « Par le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône{/g}, que se passe-t-il ici ? »

languages.text: {n}Truchsess Abelard Werserian hat einen Teil seines bisherigen Glanzes eingebüßt: Er hat Schweißperlen auf der Stirn, und ein Ärmel seines Mantel ist abgerissen und blutdurchtränkt. Dennoch steht er trotz seines schweren Atems aufrecht, und sein Blick ist fordernd, wenn auch ein wenig überrascht.{/n} "{mf|Herr|Herrin} {name}! Was ... was macht Ihr denn bloß in der {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbriefkammer{/g}? Wie seid Ihr ...?" {n}Er lässt seinen Blick über das Gemetzel um sich herum wandern, zieht die Stirn in Falten und legt eine Hand auf seine Waffe.{/n} "Der {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Thron{/g} schütze mich, was bedeutet das hier?"
languages.original_text: {n}Seneschal Abelard Werserian has lost some of his former polish: his forehead is sweating, and one of the sleeves of his coat is torn and soaked through with blood. Nonetheless, despite his heavy breathing, he stands firm and his gaze is demanding, albeit somewhat surprised.{/n} "{mf|Master|Mistress} {name}! What... Whatever are you doing in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Chamber? How did you..." {n}He surveys the carnage around him. His brow furrows, and he places a hand on his weapon.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} preserve me, what is the meaning of this?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Truchsess Abelard Werserian hat einen Teil seines bisherigen Glanzes eingebüßt: Er hat Schweißperlen auf der Stirn, und ein Ärmel seines Mantel ist abgerissen und blutdurchtränkt. Dennoch steht er trotz seines schweren Atems aufrecht, und sein Blick ist fordernd, wenn auch ein wenig überrascht.{/n} "{mf|Herr|Herrin}{name}! Was ... was macht Ihr denn bloß in der {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g}kammer? Wie seid Ihr ...? {n}Er lässt seinen Blick über das Gemetzel um sich herum wandern, zieht die Stirn in Falten und legt eine Hand auf seine Waffe.{/n} "Der {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Thron{/g} schütze mich, was bedeutet das hier?"

languages.original_text: {n}Seneschal Abelard Werserian has lost some of his former polish: his forehead is sweating, and one of the sleeves of his coat is torn and soaked through with blood. Nonetheless, despite his heavy breathing, he stands firm and his gaze is demanding, albeit somewhat surprised.{/n} "{mf|Master|Mistress} ! What... Whatever are you doing in the Warrant Chamber? How did you..." {n}He surveys the carnage around him. His brow furrows, and he places a hand on his weapon.{/n} "Throne preserve me, what is the meaning of this?"

languages.text: {n}Seneşal Abelard Werserian, haşmetini bir miktar kaybetmiş durumda: Alnı terden boncuk boncuk olmuş ve ceketinin kollarından biri yırtılıp kana bulanmış hâlde. Yine de, güçlükle nefes alıp veriyor olmasına rağmen dimdik duruyor, talepkâr ancak biraz da şaşkın bakışlarla bakıyor.{/n} "{name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}! {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g} Odası'nda ne işiniz var? Buraya nasıl..." {n}Etrafındaki katliama göz atıyor. Kaşları çatılıyor ve elinin birini silahının üstüne koyuyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Taht{/g} beni esirgesin, ne demek oluyor bunlar?"

Nonetheless, despite his heavy breathing, he stands firm and his gaze is demanding, albeit somewhat surprised.{/n} "{mf|Master|Mistress} {name}! What... Whatever are you doing in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Chamber? How did you..." {n}He surveys the carnage around him. His brow furrows, and he places a hand on his weapon.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} preserve me, what is the meaning of this?"

Yine de, güçlükle nefes alıp veriyor olmasına rağmen dimdik duruyor, talepkâr ancak biraz da şaşkın bakışlarla bakıyor.{/n} "{name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}! {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g} Odası'nda ne işiniz var? Buraya nasıl..." {n}Etrafındaki katliama göz atıyor. Kaşları çatılıyor ve elinin birini silahının üstüne koyuyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Taht{/g} beni esirgesin, ne demek oluyor bunlar?"
